results.description: Liverpool midfielder Naby Keita returns to the Guinea squad for their upcoming 2021 Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool's Keita returns to Guinea squad
results.title: Liverpool's Naby Keita returns to Guinea squad

results.description: Former Chelsea and Leicester City coach Claudio Ranieri is shortlisted for the vacant position of Guinea national coach.
results.shortTitle: Ranieri in race to become Guinea coach
results.title: Claudio Ranieri in race to take over as new Guinea coach

results.description: Riyad Mahrez scores a superb goal as Algeria cruise past Guinea 3-0 to book their place in the Africa Cup of Nations quarter-finals.
results.shortTitle: Mahrez scores as Algeria beat Guinea
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Algeria 3-0 Guinea

results.description: Holders Cameroon are out after losing to Nigeria in the Africa Cup of Nations on Saturday, but can minnows Madagascar cause another upset on day 17?
results.shortTitle: Day 17 at Africa Cup of Nations
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: What to look out for on day 17 in Egypt

thumbnail.altText: Madagascar's Lalaina Nomenjanahary celebrates scoring at the Africa Cup of Nations

results.description: Guinea midfielder Naby Keita leaves the Africa Cup of Nations in Egypt to fly to Liverpool for assessment and treatment.
results.shortTitle: Keita injury to be assessed in Liverpool
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Guinea's Naby Keita flies to Liverpool for treatment

results.description: Mohamed Yattara scores twice as Guinea beat 10-man Burundi 2-0 to keep alive their hopes of reaching the Africa Cup of Nations last 16.
results.shortTitle: Guinea win to keep qualification hopes alive
results.title: Burundi 0-2 Guinea: Result means Guinea can still make Africa Cup of Nations last 16

results.description: Madagascar beat Nigeria & Guinea are winners against Burundi in the final round of Group B games at the 2019 African Cup of Nations.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Madagascar win group & qualify with Nigeria

results.description: Nigeria become the first team to qualify for the last 16 of the Africa Cup of Nations as they beat Guinea 1-0.
results.shortTitle: Nigeria beat Guinea to reach last 16
results.title: Nigeria 1-0 Guinea: Kenneth Omeruo goal takes Nigeria into last 16

results.description: Nigeria make it two wins out of two at the start of the Africa Cup of Nations with victory over Naby Keita's Guinea.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Nigeria 1-0 Guinea - Omeruo header seals qualification

results.description: Liverpool's Naby Keita is named in Guinea's final 23-man squad for the Africa Cup of Nations in Egypt despite admitting that he is 'not yet fully fit to play.'
results.shortTitle: Keita named in Guinea's final Afcon squad
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Liverpool's Keita named in Guinea squad
